title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: XRP Gains 6.6% as Index Trades Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Stellar (XLM) joined Ripple (XRP) as a top performer, gaining 5.3%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3796.28, up 3.3% (+120.73) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

Seventeen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: XRP (+6.6%) and XLM (+5.3%).

Laggards: RENDER (-2.7%) and NEAR (-0.7%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading up 3.3% with 17 of 20 assets trading higher, indicating broad market gains.
